TEXT.TITLE: QUAKER CHEMICAL <QCHM> TO REPURCHASE SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Quaker Chemical Corp said its board has authorized the repurchase from time to time of up to 300,000 common shares. Quaker now has about 6.6 mln shares outstanding. Reuter
